# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="584aa-102">Tlačiť e-maily, kalendáre a prílohy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="584aa-103">Tlač e-mailovej správy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="584aa-104">Vyberte správu, ktorú chcete vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="584aa-105">V pravom hornom rohu správy vyberte tri bodky a potom vyberte položku **Tlačiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="584aa-106">Tlač kalendára:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="584aa-107">V pravom hornom rohu stránky vyberte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="584aa-108">**Tlačiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="584aa-109">Vyberte zobrazenie a časový rozsah, a vyberte položku **Tlačiť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="584aa-110">Tlačiť prílohu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="584aa-111">Otvorte správu, ktorá obsahuje prílohu, ktorú chcete vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="584aa-112">Presuňte kurzor nad prílohu a vyberte ikonu **Stiahnuť**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="584aa-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-113"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="584aa-114">Po stiahnutí súboru, otvorte ho s príslušný program a vyberte možnosť tlač.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="584aa-115">Napríklad, otvorte súbor s príponou .doc v programe Word a potom vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="584aa-116">Ďalšie informácie, pozrite si [vytlačiť e-mailové správy, prílohy, a kalendárov v Outlooku na webe](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="584aa-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
